wikipedia_page.main: Edith Sophia Hooper (4 March 1868 – 21 April 1926) was a British suffragette, born in Tenby, Pembrokeshire, Wales. She was matriculated at University of St Andrews, and wrote the biographies of Josephine Butler, Frank Podmore, George Rundle Prynne, Joseph Skipsey and William Westall.

response: * Edith Sophia Hooper (1868–1926) – suffragist and biographer of Josephine Butler
